verbs.description: Although [ARG1: neither President Donald Trump nor U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren] [V: were] [ARG2: in Worcester] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] , the GOP leader and Democrat dominated much of the talk at the Massachusetts Republican Party 's convention .

[ARGM-ADV: Although neither President Donald Trump nor U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren were in Worcester Saturday] , [ARG0: the GOP leader and Democrat] [V: dominated] [ARG1: much of the talk] [ARGM-LOC: at the Massachusetts Republican Party 's convention] .
